Fine.

Oh, the only thing I'm looking for right now is this drink.
Ack!

What?
No. No, I don't think so.
Yeah.
Hah.

Well, it can't get any worse.
Hm.
The savior of souls!
Welcome back, Trent. The usual?
Sure, I’ll have 2!
Any reason for this celebration?
Absolutely. Got twice the reason! First of all, I, finally, have managed to pay all my debts!
For the beginning of a new life! This one’s on me!
Thanks, friend! You are definitely the best person in this godforsaken place!
But if there’s a "first of all", there should be "second of all". Go on and tell me, or else I’ll die of curiousity.
Don’t you dare die on me! I’ll never get over the loss .

Look
Greetings, Trent! This is Alaric! Good news. I think we can fix the hole in your finnances. Meet me at Magderburg, Sigma-13 System. See you soon!
What do you think?
I think you're the lucking son of a bitch on this junkpile of a planet.
No, I mean.. Should I agree? Go there?

You could, of course, let things be as they are and do nothing. Got enough money to sustain yourself; a risk-free life, other than dying in your 40s working in the mine. But, I think, if life gives you a chance to get out of this mud-hole - it’s a sin not to take that chance. But, it’s your call.
So why aren’t you flying away from this “mud-hole” yourself?

That, friend, is my mud-hole. I’ve grown into it and I love it. And I don’t have friends like yours, asking me to drop everything I’m doing and come over to Magdeburgh. And then, if I leave, who’s going to be the savior of strangers’ souls?.
You’re right, without you this place would’ve been gloomy. I’ll head to the spaceport, then?
Good luck, Trent! Hopefully, we’ll never meet here again.
